ygData.subject: Re:  Bard magnets .....
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a magnet too.  In Permafrost Keep I have the healer(whatever of the healing type classes)in the party keep me at the top of their list, and I request they
ygData.messageBody:
I am a magnet too. In Permafrost Keep I have the healer(whatever of the
healing type classes)in the party keep me at the top of their list, and I
request they keep enough mana for a heal at all times. It seems no matter
how much damage/taunting others do...in am the center of attention. In a
disorganized party, I am dead meat. So if you plan to visit Permafrost, be
in a party and explain to them the advantages you bring to a party (if they
don't know) and tell them that you should not be the "puller" and that you
most likely will be the center of attention.

Fflewdeur
P.S. Lions like me too! Always having to run from them! I try not to kill
any cats because of faction, but they seem to want to play! Hehe...for some
reason...
